Package aurelienribon.slidinglayout

Interface Summary

Class Summary
SLAnimator  
SLAnimator.ComponentAccessor  
SLConfig A configuration lets you easily layout the children of a SLPanel.
SLKeyframe A keyframe wraps a layout configuration together with various parameters, such as the ending and starting sides of new and old components, and the optional delays that can be applied to the components to create some nice effects.
SLPanel The SLPanel is the root of the library.
